snippet: A district court judge in Manhattan found the boxing promoter Don King liable for breach of contract over an April 25 bout in Moscow.
abstract: District court judge in Manhattan rules that boxing promoter Don King is liable for breach of contract over bout in Moscow in which one of his fighters, Guillermo Jones, failed a drug test.
lead_paragraph: A district court judge in Manhattan found the boxing promoter Don King liable for breach of contract over an April 25 bout in Moscow.

headline.main: Judge Says Boxing Promoter Broke Deal
